use_case.title: Navigate Help Using a Table of Contents
use_case.description:
This is a subfunction use case for the View Help summary use case (PSRV-00710).

From any Help page, the Portal Participant can view Help information organized in a traditional table of contents format. In addition, the WP can quickly move to the appropriate Help files from the table of contents.

trigger.value: The WP wants to find Help information through a table of contents format

use_case.preconditions: The WP participant is viewing a Help page.
use_case.basic_path:
1. The WP selects the action to view the Help table of contents page.
  2. The system displays the Help table of contents page.
  3. The WP chooses a Help topic to view.
  4. The system displays the selected Help topic.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The system simultaneously displays the original Armenta page and the Help page that was requested from the Help table of contents page.
